title: Katy Perry's First-Ever Mumbai Performance: Everything We Know About The OnePlus Music Festival
text:
A little less than a month more and international icon Katy Perry will be in Bollywood’s hometown, to mark her first-ever Mumbai performance. All thanks to the OnePlus Music Festival!

In a show of commitment to their extensive loyal user base in India, the Shenzhen based company has chosen India for their first-ever music festival and we couldn’t be more delighted. The event will be held on 16th November at the DY Patil Stadium in Navi Mumbai. While OnePlus has confirmed that Katy Perry is headlining the event, she isn’t going to be the only megastar to enthrall us on the stage. English singer and songwriter Dua Lipa will also be performing at the evnt

For Katy Perry it’s her second time in India. She performed at the opening ceremony of the 2012 Indian Premier League (IPL) held in Chennai.

“I am so happy to be returning to India and excited to headline my first-ever performance in Mumbai. I am looking forward to seeing and singing with all of my Indian KatyCats at the OnePlus Music Festival," said Katy Perry.

Making her debut performance in India, Dua Lipa will take the stage right after Katy and will be followed by Bollywood’s very own Amit Trivedi.

Besides the international line up, several homegrown musical talents will also perform at the OnePlus Music Festival. The Local Train, a rock band from Delhi known for their singles like ‘Aaoge Tum Kabhi’ and ‘Choo Lo’ will be performing at the event. Other names include Ritviz, the 22-year-old Hindustani musical prodigy from Pune and the global band aswekeepsearching who have been spreading their brand of positivity and hopefulness across the globe since 2015.

If you still haven’t booked your tickets for the event of the year, you can grab them here.
